subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy had a birdie putt on his last eight holes and converted half of them on his way to a six-under-par 66 to join Chris Riley in the lead after the first round.
snippet: Rory McIlroy had a birdie putt on his last eight holes and converted half of them on his way to a six-under-par 66 to join Chris Riley in the lead after the first round.
